Uses of Class
net.dv8tion.jda.bot.sharding.DefaultShardManagerBuilder

  • Packages that use DefaultShardManagerBuilder 
    Package Description
    net.dv8tion.jda.bot.sharding  

    • Uses of DefaultShardManagerBuilder in net.dv8tion.jda.bot.sharding

      Methods in net.dv8tion.jda.bot.sharding that return DefaultShardManagerBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DefaultShardManagerBuilder DefaultShardManagerBuilder.addEventListeners(java.util.Collection<java.lang.Object> listeners)
      Adds all provided listeners to the list of listeners that will be used to populate the DefaultShardManager object.
      DefaultShardManagerBuilder DefaultShardManagerBuilder.addEventListeners(java.lang.Object... listeners)
      Adds all provided listeners to the list of listeners that will be used to populate the DefaultShardManager object.
      DefaultShardManagerBuilder DefaultShardManagerBuilder.removeEventListeners(java.util.Collection<java.lang.Object> listeners)
      Removes all provided listeners from the list of listeners.
      DefaultShardManagerBuilder DefaultShardManagerBuilder.removeEventListeners(java.lang.Object... listeners)
      Removes all provided listeners from the list of listeners.
      DefaultShardManagerBuilder DefaultShardManagerBuilder.setAudioEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Enables/Disables Voice functionality.
      DefaultShardManagerBuilder DefaultShardManagerBuilder.setAutoReconnect(boolean autoReconnect)
      Sets whether or not JDA should try to reconnect if a connection-error is encountered.
      DefaultShardManagerBuilder DefaultShardManagerBuilder.setBulkDeleteSplittingEnabled(boolean enabled)
      If enabled, JDA will separate the bulk delete event into individual delete events, but this isn't as efficient as handling a single event would be.
      DefaultShardManagerBuilder DefaultShardManagerBuilder.setContextEnabled(boolean enable)
      Whether JDA should use a synchronized MDC context for all of its controlled threads.
      DefaultShardManagerBuilder DefaultShardManagerBuilder.setContextMap(java.util.function.IntFunction<java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> provider)
      Sets the MDC mappings provider to use in JDA.
      DefaultShardManagerBuilder DefaultShardManagerBuilder.setCorePoolSize(int size)
      Sets the core pool size for the global JDA ScheduledExecutorService which is used in various locations throughout the JDA instance created by this ShardManager.
      DefaultShardManagerBuilder DefaultShardManagerBuilder.setEnableShutdownHook(boolean enable)
      Enables/Disables the use of a Shutdown hook to clean up the ShardManager and it's JDA instances.
      DefaultShardManagerBuilder DefaultShardManagerBuilder.setEventManager(IEventManager manager)
      Changes the internally used EventManager.
      DefaultShardManagerBuilder DefaultShardManagerBuilder.setGame(Game game)
      Sets the Game for our session.
      DefaultShardManagerBuilder DefaultShardManagerBuilder.setGameProvider(java.util.function.IntFunction<Game> gameProvider)
      Sets the Game for our session.
      DefaultShardManagerBuilder DefaultShardManagerBuilder.setHttpClientBuilder(okhttp3.OkHttpClient.Builder builder)
      Sets the Builder that will be used by JDA's requester.
      DefaultShardManagerBuilder DefaultShardManagerBuilder.setIdle(boolean idle)
      Sets whether or not we should mark our sessions as afk
      This value can be changed at any time using DefaultShardManager#setIdleProvider(boolean).
      DefaultShardManagerBuilder DefaultShardManagerBuilder.setIdleProvider(java.util.function.IntFunction<java.lang.Boolean> idleProvider)
      Sets whether or not we should mark our sessions as afk
      This value can be changed at any time using DefaultShardManager#setIdleProvider(boolean).
      DefaultShardManagerBuilder DefaultShardManagerBuilder.setMaxReconnectDelay(int maxReconnectDelay)
      Sets the maximum amount of time that JDA will back off to wait when attempting to reconnect the MainWebsocket.
      DefaultShardManagerBuilder DefaultShardManagerBuilder.setRequestTimeoutRetry(boolean retryOnTimeout)
      Whether the Requester should retry when a SocketTimeoutException occurs.
      DefaultShardManagerBuilder DefaultShardManagerBuilder.setSessionController(SessionController controller)
      Sets the SessionController for the resulting ShardManager instance.
      DefaultShardManagerBuilder DefaultShardManagerBuilder.setShards(java.util.Collection<java.lang.Integer> shardIds)
      Sets the range of shards the DefaultShardManager should contain.
      DefaultShardManagerBuilder DefaultShardManagerBuilder.setShards(int... shardIds)
      Sets the list of shards the DefaultShardManager should contain.
      DefaultShardManagerBuilder DefaultShardManagerBuilder.setShards(int minShardId, int maxShardId)
      Sets the range of shards the DefaultShardManager should contain.
      DefaultShardManagerBuilder DefaultShardManagerBuilder.setShardsTotal(int shardsTotal)
      This will set the total amount of shards the DefaultShardManager should use.
      DefaultShardManagerBuilder DefaultShardManagerBuilder.setStatus(OnlineStatus status)
      Sets the OnlineStatus our connection will display.
      DefaultShardManagerBuilder DefaultShardManagerBuilder.setStatusProvider(java.util.function.IntFunction<OnlineStatus> statusProvider)
      Sets the OnlineStatus our connection will display.
      DefaultShardManagerBuilder DefaultShardManagerBuilder.setThreadFactory(java.util.concurrent.ThreadFactory threadFactory)
      Sets the ThreadFactory that will be used by the internal executor of the ShardManager.
      DefaultShardManagerBuilder DefaultShardManagerBuilder.setToken(java.lang.String token)
      Sets the token that will be used by the ShardManager instance to log in when build() is called.
      DefaultShardManagerBuilder DefaultShardManagerBuilder.setUseShutdownNow(boolean useShutdownNow)
      Whether the ShardManager should use JDA#shutdownNow() instead of JDA#shutdown() to shutdown it's shards.
      DefaultShardManagerBuilder DefaultShardManagerBuilder.setWebsocketFactory(com.neovisionaries.ws.client.WebSocketFactory factory)
      Sets the WebSocketFactory that will be used by JDA's websocket client.
